=======
History
=======

0.2.3 (2016-2-10)
------------------

* Fix some errors (like file upload).

0.2.2 (2016-2-3)
------------------

* Fix validation of standard types.

------------------

* Change license to MIT.

0.2.0 (2016-1-31)
------------------

* Now support swagger APIs not made with connexion.

0.1 (2016-1-29)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.
